conversation.personSelected: Got it. We'll investigate this person thoroughly: career history, digital presence, connections, media mentions...
conversation.nicheSelected: Interesting. A complete market analysis: main players, trends, opportunities, market size...
conversation.connectionSelected: Understood. We'll map the paths for you to connect: mutual connections, events, companies, bridge contacts...
